title: Innovating Teacher-Student Relationships Through Collaborative Learning: Competency-Based Simulation Training

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental learning skills, communication abilities, and experience with VR devices
context.additional_context: Strengthens learner-to-learner and learner-to-instructor interactions by performing role-playing in VR simulations that reflect real workplace settings.

learning_goals: Achieving over 80% participation in establishing horizontal teacher-student relationships during the design and implementation of collaborative learning activities
Over 90% of learners demonstrating creative approaches to team-based problem-solving tasks in VR simulation environments
Attaining over 75% improvement in critical thinking indicators through learner self-assessment and peer assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
